name: Web Sarga Solutions
overview:
WebSarga Solutions is a complete Web Interactive Agency, specializing in Online Communications, Digital Experiences and Business-empowering Technology services.

With office in New Delhi, the team comprises of a team of professionals segmented into five teams:

  • Interactive Design,
  • Content Management,
  • Internet Marketing,
  • Technology
  • Project Management.

Services Offered:

  • Website Design
  • E-Commerce
  • Internet Marketing
  • Podcasting
  • Web Application Development
  • Website Maintenance
  • Multimedia Presentations
  • Corporate identity
  • Virtual Walkthrough
  • Media Streaming
  • Online communities & Social Networks
  • Content Management
